trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all data control field types, which represent a column of data in tabular data-bound controls such as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som basisklasse for alle kontrollen feltet datatyper som representerer en kolonne med data i tabellformat databundet Kontroller eksempel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> og <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DataControlField class serves as the base class for all data control field types.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataControlField fungerer som basisklasse for alle data kontrolltyper.

trans-unit.source: Data control fields are used by data-bound controls to represent a field of data, similar to how a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn> object represents a type of column in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen datafelt brukes av databundet kontroller til å representere et felt med data, tilsvarende hvordan en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>objektet representerer typen for kolonnen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: Use the classes that are derived from DataControlField to control how a field of data is displayed in a data-bound control such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk klassene som er avledet fra DataControlField å styre hvordan et felt med data vises i en databundet-kontroll for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different data control field types provided by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser de ulike felt kontrolltypene leveres av ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: |Column field type|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>|Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>|Displays a command button in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: | Feltet kolonnetypen | Beskrivelse | |-----------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>| Viser verdien for et felt i en datakilde som tekst. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>| Viser kommando i en databundet-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the control, this allows you to display either a row or a column with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>|Displays a check box in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av kontrollen, kan du vise en raden eller en kolonne med en egendefinert knappekontrollen, for eksempel en Legg til eller Fjern-knappen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>| Viser en avmerkingsboks i en databundet-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: This data control field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>|Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in a data-bound control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField>|Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: Denne kontrollen feltet datatypen brukes vanligvis til å vise felt med en boolsk verdi. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>| Viser innebygd kommando knappene for å utføre Rediger og sette inn eller slette operasjoner i en databundet-kontroll. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField>| Viser verdien for et felt i en datakilde som en hyperkobling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: This data control field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>|Displays an image in a data-bound control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>|Displays user-defined content in a data-bound control according to a specified template.| You can also extend the DataControlField and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> classes to create your own data control field types.
trans-unit.target: Denne kontrollen feltet datatypen kan du binde et annet felt til hyperkoblingen URL-adresse. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>| Viser et bilde i en databundet-kontroll. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>| Viser en brukerdefinert innhold i en databundet kontroll i henhold til en angitt mal. | Du kan også utvide DataControlField og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>klasser til å opprette dine egne data kontroll typer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: The DataControlField class provides many properties that determine how user interface (UI) elements are presented in the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataControlField inneholder mange egenskaper som bestemmer hvordan elementer i brukergrensesnittet (UI) vises i databindingselementer-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Not every control uses every available data control field property when rendering a UI.
trans-unit.target: Ikke alle kontrollen bruker feltegenskapen alle tilgjengelige data-kontroll ved gjengivelse av et brukergrensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, which displays the data control fields as rows, includes a header item for each data control field, but no footer item.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen som viser kontrollen datafeltene som rader, inneholder en overskriftselementet for hvert felt for kontroll av data, men ingen bunntekst vare.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A> properties are ignored by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Derfor den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>ignoreres av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, however, uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A> properties if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowFooter%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll, må imidlertid bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>Egenskaper hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowFooter%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowFooter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the data control field properties affect the presentation of UI elements depending on what the element is.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte påvirker egenskapene data kontrollen feltet presentasjonen UI-elementer avhengig av hva elementet er.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A> property is always applied to the field.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>egenskapen brukes alltid til feltet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the type derived from DataControlField contains a control, as in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> classes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A> property is applied to the field.
trans-unit.target: Hvis typen avledet fra DataControlField inneholder en kontroll som i det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>klasser, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>egenskapen brukes til feltet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> class is abstract, you cannot create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object directly.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>klassen er abstrakt, du kan ikke opprette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objekt direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kalles vanligvis av konstruktøren avledede klassens initialisere egenskaper som er definert i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets text that is rendered as the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AbbreviatedText" name="AbbreviatedText" href=""></xref> property value in some controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som skal gjengis som den <xref uid="langword_csharp_AbbreviatedText" name="AbbreviatedText" href=""> </xref> egenskapsverdien i noen kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.OnFieldChanged%2A> method is called to raise a state change event when the AccessibleHeaderText property is set.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.OnFieldChanged%2A>metoden kalles for å opphøye en hendelse for endring av tilstand når egenskapen AccessibleHeaderText er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.OnFieldChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the AccessibleHeaderText property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for AccessibleHeaderText er lagret i visningen tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents abbreviated text read by screen readers.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer forkortet tekst som leses av skjermlesere.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate copy of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>-derived object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kopi av gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>-avledet objektet.

trans-unit.source: The CloneField method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.CloneFields%2A> method to create a copy of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>-derived object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CloneField er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.CloneFields%2A>metode for å opprette en kopi av gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>-avledet objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection.CloneFields%2A>

trans-unit.source: A duplicate copy of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the data control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til data-kontroll av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objekt er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: The Control reference is set when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Initialize%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Kontroll-referanse angis når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Initialize%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data control that owns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Datakontrollen som eier den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style of any Web server controls contained by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilen for en hvilken som helst webserverkontroller som inneholder den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The ControlStyle property governs the appearance of any Web server controls contained by types derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ControlStyle styrer utseendet av en hvilken som helst webserverkontroller ligge typer utledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: This property does not affect all derived types.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker ikke alle avledede typer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> control, which typically displays text data and contains only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controls, is only affected by the ControlStyle property when in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>kontrollen, som vanligvis viser tekstdata og inneholder bare <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>kontrollerer, påvirkes bare av egenskapen ControlStyle når i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>tilstand.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: Web server controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> might be affected by the ControlStyle property, depending on the specific configuration of the control object instances contained by the field.
trans-unit.target: Web serverkontroller eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>kan bli påvirket av egenskapen ControlStyle, avhengig av konfigurasjonen på kontrollen objektet forekomstene i feltet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> control can be rendered as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> object.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>kontrollen, kan gjengis som en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: Although a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is affected by `font` attributes of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is not.
trans-unit.target: Selv om en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>kontrollen påvirkes av `font` attributtene for den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objekt, et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>kontrollen er ikke.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that governs the appearance of Web server controls contained by the field.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som styrer utseendet til serveren for webkontroller finnes i feltet.

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>-derived object to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Overfører egenskaper for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>-avledet objektet til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The CopyProperties method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A> method to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>-derived object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object created by the method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CopyProperties er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>metode for å kopiere egenskaper for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>-avledet objekt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objektet er opprettet av metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> to which to copy the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> du vil kopiere egenskaper for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>-derived object.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, oppretter du en tom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>-avledet objektet.

trans-unit.source: The CreateField method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A> method to create an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>-derived object to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>-derived object into.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateField er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>metode for å opprette et tomt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>-avledet objekt for å kopiere egenskaper for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>-avledet objektet i.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>-derived object.
trans-unit.target: En tom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>-avledet objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a data control field is currently viewed in a design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om et datafelt for kontrollen for øyeblikket vises i et miljø med utformingen.

trans-unit.source: The DesignMode property exposes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DesignMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: DesignMode egenskapen viser den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DesignMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DesignMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> instance that is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Initialize%2A> method is used.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>-forekomst som er sendt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Initialize%2A>metoden brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Initialize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> is currently viewed in a design-time environment; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> er for øyeblikket vises i et miljø med utformingen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Extracts the value of the data control field from the current table cell and adds the value to the specified <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection.
trans-unit.target: Trekker ut verdien i feltet for kontrollen fra den gjeldende tabellcellen og legger til verdien angitt <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>samlingen.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The ExtractValuesFromCell method is implemented by types derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> to associate the current field with a value, if applicable.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ExtractValuesFromCell implementeres av typer utledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>å knytte gjeldende felt til en verdi hvis det er aktuelt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: The field/value pair is stored in the `dictionary` collection that is passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: Feltet/verdi-paret er lagret i det `dictionary` samling som er sendt til metoden.

trans-unit.source: The ExtractValuesFromCell method is called by the `ExtractRowValues` method of data controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ExtractValuesFromCell kalles av den `ExtractRowValues` -metoden til kontroller for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> objects to assemble a set of cells and their associated values.
trans-unit.target: Kall denne metoden når du skriver et egendefinert databundet kontrollere som bruker <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>objekter til å sette sammen en rekke celler og de tilhørende verdiene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>

trans-unit.source: Implement this method when you are writing a class derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> that displays user data or data-bound data.
trans-unit.target: Implementer denne metoden når du skriver en klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>som viser brukerdata eller databundet data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: Not all derived types implement the ExtractValuesFromCell method, because not all fields display user data.
trans-unit.target: Ikke alle avledede typer implementere metoden ExtractValuesFromCell fordi ikke alle felt viser brukerdata.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> control displays a button and has no user data.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>kontrollen viser en knapp og har ingen brukerdata.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> that contains the text or controls of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> som inneholder tekst eller kontroller av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the values of read-only fields are included in the `dictionary` collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi at verdiene til skrivebeskyttet omfattes av `dictionary` samlingen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the footer of the data control field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen på bunnteksten i feltet for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The FooterStyle property governs the appearance of any text displayed in the footer item of a type derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen FooterStyle styrer utseendet til tekst som vises i elementet bunntekst av en type som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some data-bound controls do not render a footer item for a data control field.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Noen databundet kontroller ikke gjengis en bunntekst vare for et datafelt for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays its data control fields as rows.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen viser data kontrollen feltene som rader.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A footer item is not rendered for these data control fields.
trans-unit.target: Et element i bunnteksten gjengis ikke for disse feltene for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The FooterStyle property is ignored in these controls.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen FooterStyle ignoreres i disse kontrollene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that governs the appearance of the footer item of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som styrer utseendet til bunntekst element av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the footer item of a data control field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises i elementet bunntekst for et datafelt for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterText property to add notes or comments to a data control field, or for other data related to the field.
trans-unit.target: Bruk FooterText-egenskapen til å legge til merknader eller kommentarer i et datafelt for kontrollen, eller til andre data relatert til felt.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some data-bound controls do not render a footer item for a data control field.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Noen databundet kontroller ikke gjengis en bunntekst vare for et datafelt for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays its data control fields as rows.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen viser data kontrollen feltene som rader.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A footer item is not rendered for these data control fields.
trans-unit.target: Et element i bunnteksten gjengis ikke for disse feltene for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A> property is ignored in these controls.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>egenskapen ignoreres i disse kontrollene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that is displayed in the footer item of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som vises i bunnteksten element av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image that is displayed in the header item of a data control field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bilde som vises i overskriftselementet for et datafelt for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Set the HeaderImageUrl property when you want an image displayed in the header item of a data control instead of header text.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen HeaderImageUrl når du vil bruke et bilde som vises i overskriftselementet til en kontroll data i stedet for toppteksten.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A> and HeaderImageUrl properties are set, the HeaderImageUrl property has precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>og HeaderImageUrl egenskapene er angitt, prioriteres egenskapen HeaderImageUrl.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a fully qualified or relative URL to an image that is displayed in the header item of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer en fullstendig kvalifisert eller relativ URL-adresse til et bilde som vises i overskriftselementet av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the header of the data control field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen på hodet i feltet for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The HeaderStyle property governs the appearance of any text displayed in the header item of a type derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HeaderStyle styrer utseendet til tekst som vises i overskriftselementet av en type som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: The most common application of the HeaderStyle property is to alter the style of the column headers in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Vanligste programmet for egenskapen HeaderStyle er å endre stilen for kolonneoverskriftene i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that governs the appearance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> header item.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som styrer utseendet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> overskriftselementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the header item of a data control field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises i overskriftselementet for et datafelt for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderText property to identify a field in a data control with a friendly name.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen HeaderText identifiserer et felt i et data-kontroll med et egendefinert navn.

trans-unit.source: The most common application of the HeaderText property is to provide meaningful column names for data-bound fields in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Vanligste programmet for egenskapen HeaderText er å angi betydning kolonnenavn for databundet felt i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the HeaderText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A> property has precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge HeaderText og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>egenskapene er angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>egenskapen prioriteres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that is displayed in the header item of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som vises i overskriftselementet av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs basic instance initialization for a data control field.
trans-unit.target: Utfører grunnleggende forekomsten initialisering for et datafelt for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The control that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object is associated with calls the Initialize method to initialize the field before it is added to a rows collection.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objektet er tilknyttet samtaler initialiseringsmetoden initialisere feltet før det legges til i en samling med rader.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: Data controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> call the Initialize method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before calling other methods such as `CreateRow` to create specific rows with data.
trans-unit.target: Data kontroller for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kaller Initialize-metoden i sine `CreateChildControls` metodene før du kaller andre metoder som `CreateRow` til å opprette bestemte rader med data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> objects to perform basic initialization for any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> objects.
trans-unit.target: Kall denne metoden når du skriver et egendefinert databundet kontrollere som bruker <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>objekter til å utføre grunnleggende initialisering for noen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objekter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>

trans-unit.source: Implement this method if your derived type requires any object initialization before it populates <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> objects with data or controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InitializeCell%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementer denne metoden hvis den utledede typen krever en objekt-initialisering før den fyller ut <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>objekter med data, eller kontroller i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InitializeCell%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InitializeCell%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the control supports the sorting of columns of data.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om kontrollen støtter sorteringen av kolonner med data.

trans-unit.source: The data control that owns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Datakontrollen som eier den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds text or controls to a cell's controls collection.
trans-unit.target: Legger til tekst eller kontroller til en celle Kontroller samling.

trans-unit.source: Types derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> implement the InitializeCell method to add text and controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object that belongs to a data control that uses tables to display a user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Typer utledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>implementere InitializeCell-metode for å legge til tekst og kontroller til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>objekt som tilhører en data-kontroll som bruker tabellene til å vise brukergrensesnittet (UI).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: These data controls create the complete table structure row by row when their respective `CreateChildControls` methods are called.
trans-unit.target: Disse Kontroller opprette hele tabellstrukturen rad for rad når de respektive `CreateChildControls` kalles metoder.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeCell method is called by the `InitializeRow` method of data controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeCell kalles av den `InitializeRow` -metoden til kontroller for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> objects to initialize the cells of the table structure with data or controls.
trans-unit.target: Kall denne metoden når du skriver et egendefinert databundet kontrollere som bruker <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>objekter initialisere cellene i tabellstrukturen med data eller kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>

trans-unit.source: Implement this method when you are writing a class derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>.
trans-unit.target: Implementer denne metoden når du skriver en klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> that contains the text or controls of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> som inneholder tekst eller kontroller av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values, specifying the state of the row that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> verdier som angir tilstanden til raden som inneholder den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> is contained in.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> ligger i.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object is visible when its parent data-bound control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objektet er synlig når den overordnede databundet kontrollen er i insert-modus.

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control is in insert mode when the state of the current display row is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En databundet kontroll er i insert-modus når i gjeldende visning rad er <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control checks the value of this property before it renders a set of fields.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen kontrollerer verdien for denne egenskapen før den gjengir et sett med felt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: If the InsertVisible property is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen InsertVisible `false`, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objektet er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the InsertVisible property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for InsertVisible er lagret i visningen tilstand.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the field is visible when its parent data-bound control is rendered in insert mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det vises når den overordnede databundet kontrollen gjengis i insert-modus. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object is saving changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objektet er lagrer endringer i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source view is marked to save its state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis datakildevisningen er merket for å lagre tilstanden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style of any text-based content displayed by a data control field.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilen for tekstbaserte innhold vises som et datafelt for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ItemStyle property governs the appearance of any text data displayed by a type derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ItemStyle styrer utseendet til alle text-dataene som vises i en type som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you bind a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> control to text data, you can use the ItemStyle property to alter the appearance of the text that is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Når du for eksempel binde en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>kontrollen til text-data, kan du bruke egenskapen ItemStyle til å endre utseendet til tekst som vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that governs the appearance of text displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som styrer utseendet til tekst som vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Restores the data source view's previously saved view state.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretter i datakildevisningen tidligere lagret visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av .NET Framework-infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere kan imidlertid overstyre denne metoden hvis du vil angi hvordan en egendefinert serverkontroll gjenoppretter visningstilstanden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET oversikt over tilstand](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: This method restores view-state information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden gjenoppretter visningsstatus informasjon for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objektet fra en tidligere sideforespørsel som er lagret av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SaveViewState%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SaveViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> state to restore.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> tilstand for å gjenopprette.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FieldChanged" name="FieldChanged" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref uid="langword_csharp_FieldChanged" name="FieldChanged" href=""> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnFieldChanged method raises an event signaling that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object's state has changed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnFieldChanged opphøyer en hendelse som signaliserer som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objektets tilstanden er endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the following properties cause this event to be raised: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SortExpression%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Endringer de følgende egenskapene til denne-hendelse: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SortExpression%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SortExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Derived type properties also raise this event when state changes occur.
trans-unit.target: Avledede typeegenskaper opphøyer også denne hendelsen når det gjøres tilstandsendringer.

trans-unit.source: Web server controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> typically call the `DataBind` method in response to a field change event.
trans-unit.target: Web serverkontroller eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>vanligvis kalle den `DataBind` metoden som svar på et felt endre hendelse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnFieldChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnFieldChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes made to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer endringer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> vise status siden siden ble posteres tilbake til serveren.

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: Visningsstatusen er summen av verdiene i en serverkontroll egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: Disse verdiene plasseres automatisk i server kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>egenskapen som er en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen er deretter beholdt i en strengobjektet når lagringen tilstand fase av server kontrollen levetid.

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, a string is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `hidden` element.
trans-unit.target: Når visningsstatusen lagres, returneres en streng til klienten som en variabel som er lagret i HTML `hidden` elementet.

trans-unit.source: When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når du skriver egendefinerte serverkontroller, du kan forbedre effektiviteten av overstyrer denne metoden, og endre din serverkontroll <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET visningen tilstand oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> view state.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som inneholder endringer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> vise tilstand.

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the object, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen visningsstatusen som er knyttet til objektet metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the header item of a data control field is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om overskriftselementet for et datafelt for kontrollen gjengis.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowHeader property to specify whether the header item is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ShowHeader-egenskapen til å angi om overskriftselementet vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the header item of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> is rendered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis overskriftselementet av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> er gjengitte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a sort expression that is used by a data source control to sort data.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et sorteringsuttrykk som brukes til å sortere data i en datakilde-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.OnFieldChanged%2A> method is called to raise a state change event when the SortExpression property is set.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.OnFieldChanged%2A>metoden kalles for å opphøye en hendelse for endring av tilstand når egenskapen SortExpression er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.OnFieldChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the SortExpression property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for SortExpression er lagret i visningen tilstand.

trans-unit.source: A sort expression that is used by a data source control to sort data.
trans-unit.target: Et sorteringsuttrykk som brukes til å sortere data i en datakilde-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the schema associated with this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skjemaet knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The schema associated with this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skjemaet knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object is saving changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objektet er lagrer endringer i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> is saving changes to its view state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å angi at den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> lagrer endringer i visningen er tilstand; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Restores the data control field's previously saved view state.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretter data kontroll-feltet tidligere lagret visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder lagrede visningen verdiene for kontrollen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes made to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer endringer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> vise status siden siden ble posteres tilbake til serveren.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder lagrede visningen verdiene for kontrollen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object to track changes to its view state so they can be stored in the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ViewState*> property and persisted across requests for the same page.
trans-unit.target: Gjør den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objekt for å spore endringer i visningsstatusen slik at de kan lagres i kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ViewState*>egenskapen og faste på tvers av forespørsler for samme side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ViewState*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som representerer dette <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented to return the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A> property, if the property is set.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er implementert verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>egenskapen Hvis egenskapen er angitt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method simply returns a string that represents the type of the data control field (for example, "BoundField").
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden ellers returnerer ganske enkelt en streng som representerer typen kontrollen datafeltet (for eksempel "BoundField").

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer dette <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object to track changes to its view state so they can be stored in the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ViewState*> property and persisted across requests for the same page.
trans-unit.target: Gjør den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objekt for å spore endringer i visningsstatusen slik at de kan lagres i kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ViewState*>egenskapen og faste på tvers av forespørsler for samme side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ViewState*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control validates client input.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen validerer klienten inndata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control validates client input; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen validerer klienten inndataene; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, signals that the controls contained by a field support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, støtter signaliserer at kontrollene som et felt inneholder tilbakekall.

trans-unit.source: The ValidateSupportsCallback method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ValidateSupportsCallback er en helper brukes til å bestemme om kontrollene finnes i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objekt støtte tilbakeringinger.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: The base implementation of this method has been implemented to throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception to indicate that callbacks are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Grunnleggende implementeringen av denne metoden er implementert for å slette en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak som viser at tilbakeringinger ikke støttes.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: The method is called on a default instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kalles på standardforekomsten av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object across multiple requests for the same page.
trans-unit.target: Henter en ordliste for informasjon om at du kan lagre og gjenopprette visningsstatusen for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objektet på tvers av flere forespørsler om samme side.

trans-unit.source: A data control field's view state is the accumulation of all its property values.
trans-unit.target: En kontroller feltets visningen er summen av alle egenskapsverdiene.

trans-unit.source: To preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use this property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class, to store the property values.
trans-unit.target: Disse verdiene på tvers av HTTP-forespørsler, serverkontroller for ASP.NET å bruke denne egenskapen er en forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>klassen for å lagre egenskapsverdiene.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>

trans-unit.source: The values are then passed as a variable to an HTML hidden input element when subsequent requests are processed.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene er deretter sendes som en variabel til et skjult inndata HTML-element når etterfølgende forespørsler er behandlet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about saving server control view state, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du lagrer server visningsstatusen for kontrollen [ASP.NET visningen tilstand oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: View state is enabled for all server controls by default, but there are circumstances when you will want to disable it.
trans-unit.target: Visningsstatusen er aktivert for alle serverkontroller som standard, men det finnes tilfeller når vil du deaktivere den.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET ytelse oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om ordlister og hvordan de brukes, se [samlinger og datastrukturer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> view-state information.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref> som inneholder den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> visningsstatus informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a data control field is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om et datafelt for kontrollen gjengis.

trans-unit.source: Use the Visible property to show or hide <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> objects in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen Visible til å vise eller skjule <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objekter i en databundet-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: If the the Visible property is `false`, the data values are not displayed and do not make a round-trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den er egenskapen Visible `false`, dataverdiene blir ikke vist og ikke gjøre en rundtur til klienten.

trans-unit.source: If you want to round-trip the data for a field that is not visible, add the field name to the `DataKeyNames` property of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil rundtur dataene for et felt som ikke er synlig, kan du legge til feltnavnet i `DataKeyNames` databundet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> is rendered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> er gjengitte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
